thread.title: Ocean Springs officer thrown off motorcycle chasing woman -
thread.title_full: Ocean Springs officer thrown off motorcycle chasing woman - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Ocean Springs officer thrown off motorcycle chasing woman -
text:
OCEAN SPRINGS, Miss. (AP) - An Ocean Springs police motorcycle officer suffered minor injuries after he was involved in an accident with a woman that drove away from another accident scene.
Police say the woman was driving a stolen vehicle, which led police on a chase. She slammed on her brakes and caused an officer to be thrown off his motorcycle. They said the woman fled on foot and attempted to steal another vehicle before she was arrested Wednesday morning.
The Sun Herald reports ( http://bit.ly/1VTNK3D ) 31-year-old Sarah Ann Payne, of Ocean Springs, faces several felony charges, including eluding, vehicle theft and attempted vehicle theft. She also faces several misdemeanor charges.
Officer Adam Carter suffered a sprained wrist and was released from an area hospital.
Online jail records did not list an attorney for Payne.
Information from: The Sun Herald, http://www.sunherald.com
